recur.doc: Run tests in child directories, recursively. 4 dirs deep maximum

ini.doc: actual string of settings to pass to php in format " -d setting=blah"

realtimelog.doc: Log test runs/results as they are run

quiet.doc: Only display detail for failed tests

simple.doc: Display simple output for all tests

package.doc: Treat parameters as installed packages from which to run tests

phpunit.doc: Search parameters for AllTests.php, and use that to run phpunit-based tests

run-tests.doc: [testfile|dir ...] Run regression tests with PHP's regression testing script (run-tests.php).
